resources.string: Upload any file and get a sharable link for that file.
App requires certain permissions to function properly.
App Can\'t work without the permission. You have to manually enable those permissions from App settings.
This app needs your permission to read Phones storage to access files.
No internet connection!. Please try again.
Looks like something bad happened. We are taking a look at what really happened. Meanwhile, you can restart the app.
Looks like you aren\'t connected to the network. Please check you connection and try again!
It seems like you haven\'t uploaded any files yet. Upload a file and check in here again.
